DOC.brief_summary: Black cohosh is a natural supplement that has been used to treat and prevent menopausal symptoms. Remifemin is a standardized form of black cohosh. The purpose of this study is to determine the levels of components of black cohosh obtained in the blood of healthy women taking Remifemin.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of the Pharmacokinetics of Black Cohosh
DOC.criteria: No prior diagnosis of cancer other than nonmelanoma skin cancer or carcinoma insitu of the cervix No current prescription medication use Negative urine pregnancy test OR greater than age 50 with no menses for at least one year OR documented status post hysterectomy Competent to understand and sign informed consent
